description.en-US:
SimplyCast's automated marketing software makes it easy to launch online campaigns using multiple forms of communication.

One Account – Endless Possibilities

SimplyCast helps you design online campaigns, share them on social networks, build and manage lists, and track your results. Think of it as your marketing command centre and you are the captain.

- Powerful
-Easy to Use
- Integrates with SalesForce, Drupal, SugerCRM, WordPress and more.

We make it easy to send email newsletters, online surveys, fax promos, text messages and even voice recordings to your customers. We also take the hassle out of managing your subscriber lists, tracking campaign performance, and connecting to the most powerful social networks like Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

SimplyCast also includes powerful tools for marketers of all levels like A/B split testing, Facebook app creation, list segmentation, subaccounts and more.

SimplyCast's All-In-One Marketing Suite includes:

- Email Marketing
- Survey Marketing
- Event Marketing
- SMS Marketing
- Fax Marketing
- Voice Broadcasting
- Twitter Marketing
- Facebook Marketing
- Autoresponder Marketing
- Form Creation
- List Management
- IP Monitoring
- Press Release Distribution
- Link Tracking
- Landing Pages

Customers in over 175 countries use SimplyCast to reach their clients by way of online, offline, mobile and social marketing every day – What are you waiting for?

Grow your business with the World's leading multi-channel marketing solution. Install and use for free.
